title: New: Lulu James – Closer
content:
I was only re-listening to the now classic Lulu James jam, Be Safe, yesterday, gushing over everything about it.

Today we’re treated to a new single, the infectious Closer. Less of a slow jam and more disco inspired, the track is a much-needed move for James onto the dance floor. This girl is the future.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
